Package com.sanderjurgens.metroplanner.model

Class Line

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<Station>
com.sanderjurgens.metroplanner.model.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Station>, Collection<Station>, List<Station>, RandomAccess
public class Line extends ArrayList<Station>
A line with a code and a number of stops, it may be circular or one way.
Author:
sanderjurgens

      public Line(String code, boolean circular, boolean oneway) throws IllegalRequestException
      Constructs a line with given code.
      Parameters:
      code - code of the line
      circular - whether the line is circular
      oneway - whether the line is one way
      Throws:
      IllegalRequestException - if empty code is provided

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex(Station stop) throws IllegalRequestException
      Returns the index of the given stop.
      Parameters:
      stop - a given stop
      Returns:
      the index of the given stop, or -1 if it isn't on the line
      Throws:
      IllegalRequestException - if the given stop is equal to null

    • canAdd

      public boolean canAdd(Station stop)
      Indicates whether it is possible to add the given stop to this line. The stop has to be unique.
      Parameters:
      stop - a given stop
      Returns:
      whether the stop is unique to this line and non-null
